snippet: Navi Pillay, the United Nations high commissioner for human rights, expressed alarm on Friday at the rising casualty toll in Egypt’s deepening political turmoil.
lead_paragraph: Navi Pillay, the United Nations high commissioner for human rights, expressed alarm on Friday at the rising casualty toll in Egypt’s deepening political turmoil.

headline.seo: U.N. Rights Chief Cites ‘Disastrous’ Situation in Egypt
